sentence.Network_en: DET. CHRIS CAVALIERE: Years of listening to the parents of dead children.
sentence.Network_cn: 依据我多年来对死亡儿童父母心声的倾听. 我们去和那个孩子谈谈吧.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 1985年华伦天奴家族从意大利总统SANDRO PERTINI手中接受特别成就奖，荣获国家最高荣誉之“十字骑士”（CAVALIERE）勋章， …

RelatedPhrase.word: Il cavaliere inesistente, The nonexistent knight

list.key: Il cavaliere inesistente, The nonexistent knight
list.abs: 《不存在的骑士》（意大利语：Il cavaliere inesistente，英语：The nonexistent knight）是伊塔罗·卡尔维诺之作品，于1959年出版，当时作者已经退出了共产党。

auth_sentence.content: Cavaliere said the entire family is in shock.
auth_sentence.res_content: Cavaliere said the entire family is in shock.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Cavaliere said the entire family is in shock.

auth_sentence.content: "The family is distraught, they're mortified, they're embarrassed," Cavaliere said after the hearing.
auth_sentence.res_content: "The family is distraught, they're mortified, they're embarrassed," Cavaliere said after the hearing.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: "The family is distraught, they're mortified, they're embarrassed," Cavaliere said after the hearing.

auth_sentence.content: The voices of Brigati and Cavaliere are still strong even if they no longer have the roundness of youth.
auth_sentence.res_content: The voices of Brigati and Cavaliere are still strong even if they no longer have the roundness of youth.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The voices of Brigati and Cavaliere are still strong even if they no longer have the roundness of youth.
